title: Why oce is shit
body:
So i lose promos to Diamond 3 because my adc feeds then afks. Whatever, happens. Next game the enemy has a vayne that trolls and feeds, So not only is it a 4v5.. but the 5 are getting free kills. And this is how the game turns out. http://matchhistory.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-details/OC1/74761056/200155304

OCE is a fucking joke. Really, people with diamond 2 accounts dont know how to build? dont understand what a ward is? cant speak English? die over and over and over and over? gtfo.

replies.body:
It bothers me that some people in D2 can't build.
I like to think I can build, and I am S5.

> [{quoted}](name=Kartoffeln,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=lnqFHfN6,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-01-07T16:21:21.170+0000)
>
> It bothers me that some people in D2 can't build.
> I like to think I can build, and I am S5.

no offence but silver 5 is like low bronze, some players there are bronze 5 true elo as well.

> [{quoted}](name=iNoob,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=lnqFHfN6,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2015-01-07T18:20:14.436+0000)
>
> no offence but silver 5 is like low bronze, some players there are bronze 5 true elo as well.

silver v is bronze, not "like" lol

Ah yeah I watched that match, you were a pretty big %%%% about the whole thing.
The Vayne was AFK and Feeding because You In 40 Years was streaming and on promos and beat the Vayne in their previous match.


On the plus side I loved the moment where you turned into Eggnivia and the Lee Sin played football with you :D

I'm also pretty sure the J4 was just having a bad match, he played great as Lissandra in the previous match.

he built a sword of the occult at 10 minutes and died in 1 second over and over. i literally told him what to build and he didnt respond so i got pissed off. Thats not a bad game, thats a boosted player. Annie didnt place 1 ward or build a sight stone until 20 minutes. The lucians mechanics and general play were below silver.. if i called him silver it would be insulting the silver players i know. Its not rocket science.  In a 4v5, to win the game without embarrassing yourself, just cs, dont die and 1 lane will always be out numbered.

> [{quoted}](name=ALL Gizzel LoL,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=lnqFHfN6,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2015-01-08T04:16:22.100+0000)
>
> he built a sword of the occult at 10 minutes and died in 1 second over and over. i literally told him what to build and he didnt respond so i got pissed off. Thats not a bad game, thats a boosted player. Annie didnt place 1 ward or build a sight stone until 20 minutes. The lucians mechanics and general play were below silver.. if i called him silver it would be insulting the silver players i know. Its not rocket science.  In a 4v5, to win the game without embarrassing yourself, just cs, dont die and 1 lane will always be out numbered.

That sucks. Annie boosted for sure.

Can't judge a player based off of one game mate, what if he built SOTO every game, had been 50/1 in win/loss and that loss just happened to be in your game, but you'd still get extremely mad at him for building SOTO and playing badly in one game? Can't judge a player on one game, unless the person is low elo in which case it makes sense why they're there.
The J4 couldn't have been boosted since he played exceptionally as Lissandra just 5 minutes before your match started.

oce is vomit and disgusting since riot doesn't care about the region since it has 0 impact on player base or pro scene every single came in bronze to diamond 5 has at least 3 inters who throw games, im high diamond and just made this account and got lvl 30, i lose 5 lp and gain 34 when i win but i can not win no matter how hard i win lane, 0 of my teammates know how to "group" and we just complete throw a free win i think riot needs to do something about ranked in oce its disgusting i cant get out of silver 1v9ing no matter how fed i get its stupid. 9/0 cho last match, we lose becuase jax doesnt want to group

What bothers me is that a lot of people play LoL for fun even though they don't understand that Ranked is for serious competitive players. What also bothers me is that they are Diamond as well. Though going on a rant on the forums ain't gon' fix anything. Also, OCE isn't bad compared to the newer servers like Turkey and Latin.

Oh thank you for respecting me, i'm silver ^_^. I stay away from mejai's and occult.
Happens in all regions mate not just OCE.
first game of the day. 4v5, our adc is dc'd. such is life.

@OP did you ever consider the timeframe in which you were playing? please do
also find security in knowing that there are servers out there like Turkey and LAN which are apparently, really bad for their divisions, like diamond there is really bad vs say NA or something.
